original_text: There were 7 metres of curtain on each side of the entrance. Three poles with their bases held the curtains on each side.
korean_text: 문 저쪽도 그와 같으니 뜰 문 이쪽, 저쪽의 포장이 열다섯 규빗씩이요 그 기둥이 셋씩, 받침이 셋씩이라

sentences.original_text: There were 7 metres of curtain on each side of the entrance.
Three poles with their bases held the curtains on each side.
sentences.korean_translation: 받침대가 달린 세 개의 기둥이 양쪽 커튼을 지지했습니다.
